metadata.description: Questionnaire structure for Odoo Implementation Planner

sections.title: Project Basics
sections.description: General information about the project and client

questions.question: What is the project/client name?
questions.help_text: This will be used as the project name in Odoo

questions.question: Client/Company Name
questions.help_text: The legal name of the client company

questions.question: What industry is the client in?
questions.help_text: Industry context helps tailor implementation recommendations

questions.question: What language should the task plan be in?
questions.help_text: All task names and descriptions will be in this language

questions.question: What country is the client based in?
questions.help_text: Affects accounting localization and compliance requirements

questions.question: Project Start Date
questions.help_text: When the project will officially begin (used for task date calculations)

questions.question: What is the desired project timeline?
questions.help_text: Overall project duration from kickoff to go-live

questions.question: Target Go-Live Date
questions.help_text: Preferred date for production launch (optional)

questions.question: Who is the Arkode project manager?
questions.help_text: Name of the Arkode consultant leading this project

questions.question: Who are the key client stakeholders?
questions.placeholder: e.g., John Doe (CEO), Jane Smith (CFO), Mike Johnson (Operations Manager)
questions.help_text: Key decision-makers and their roles

questions.question: Enable AI Task Customization
questions.help_text: Use AI to generate context-specific tasks based on your industry, pain points, and requirements (recommended)

sections.title: Project Phases
sections.description: Which of Arkode's service phases are included in this project?

questions.question: Clarity Phase (Discovery & Requirements)
questions.help_text: Process mapping, gap analysis, and solution design

questions.question: Implementation Phase (Configuration & Setup)
questions.help_text: Odoo configuration, customization, and data migration

questions.question: Adoption Phase (Training & Change Management)
questions.help_text: User training, go-live support, and ongoing post-launch support

sections.title: Hours Allocation
sections.description: How many hours were quoted for each phase?

questions.question: Hours quoted for Clarity Phase
questions.help_text: Total hours allocated for discovery and requirements gathering

questions.question: Hours quoted for Implementation Phase
questions.help_text: Total hours allocated for configuration and setup

questions.question: Hours quoted for Adoption Phase
questions.help_text: Total hours allocated for training and go-live support

sections.title: Modules & Features
sections.description: Which Odoo modules will be implemented?

questions.question: Select all modules to be implemented

options.label: Manufacturing (MRP)
options.description: Production planning and shop floor management

questions.help_text: Select all modules that were sold to the client. Click 'Show More' to see additional modules.

sections.title: Detailed Hour Allocation (Optional - Advanced)
sections.description: Specify hours for each module and activity. Leave blank to distribute evenly.

questions.question: Do you want to specify hours per module/activity?
questions.help_text: Enable this to control exactly how implementation hours are distributed. If disabled, hours will be distributed evenly across selected modules.

questions.question: Allocate Implementation Hours
questions.content: Specify hours for each component. The sum should equal your Implementation Phase hours.

questions.question: Custom Module Development
questions.help_text: Hours for custom module development (I+D, specific customizations, etc.)

questions.question: Data Migration
questions.help_text: Hours for data migration from legacy systems

questions.question: Training (Adoption Phase)
questions.help_text: One-time training hours

questions.question: Monthly Support Hours (Adoption Phase)
questions.help_text: Support hours per month during adoption period

sections.title: Clarity Phase Details
sections.description: Additional information for the Clarity phase

questions.question: What are the client's current systems/tools?
questions.placeholder: e.g., QuickBooks for accounting, Excel for inventory, Salesforce for CRM
questions.help_text: List current software and tools being used

questions.question: What are the client's core business processes?
questions.help_text: Key business processes to be mapped and optimized

questions.question: What are the main pain points or challenges?
questions.placeholder: e.g., Lack of inventory visibility, manual order processing, disconnected systems
questions.help_text: Problems the client wants to solve with Odoo

questions.question: How many workshops/sessions are planned?
questions.help_text: Number of discovery workshops with stakeholders

sections.title: Implementation Details
sections.description: Additional information for the Implementation phase

questions.question: Is data migration required?
questions.help_text: Will historical data be migrated to Odoo?

questions.question: What data needs to be migrated?
questions.placeholder: e.g., Customers, vendors, products, opening stock balances, open invoices
questions.help_text: List the types of data to migrate

questions.question: Are there third-party integrations needed?
questions.help_text: Does Odoo need to integrate with external systems?

questions.question: List the integrations required
questions.placeholder: e.g., Shopify for e-commerce, Stripe for payments, WhatsApp for notifications
questions.help_text: Describe each integration and its purpose

questions.question: Are custom developments required?
questions.help_text: Features beyond standard Odoo functionality

questions.question: Describe the customizations needed
questions.placeholder: e.g., Custom approval workflow, specific report format, industry-specific fields
questions.help_text: Detail what needs to be customized

questions.question: Is this a multi-company setup?
questions.help_text: Multiple legal entities in one Odoo instance

questions.question: How many companies?
questions.help_text: Number of legal entities/companies to configure

questions.question: Does the client have multiple warehouses?
questions.help_text: Multiple warehouse locations to manage

questions.question: How many warehouses/locations?
questions.help_text: Number of warehouse locations

sections.title: Adoption Phase Details
sections.description: Additional information for the Adoption phase

questions.question: How many end users will need training?
questions.help_text: Total number of users who will use Odoo

questions.question: Break down users by role/department (optional)
questions.placeholder: e.g., Sales team (5), Warehouse staff (8), Finance (3), Management (2)
questions.help_text: Helps plan role-based training sessions

questions.question: Preferred training format
questions.help_text: How training will be delivered

questions.question: Documentation language(s)
questions.help_text: Language(s) for training materials and documentation

questions.question: How many days of intensive go-live support?
questions.help_text: Days of on-site/intensive support during go-live

questions.question: Adoption support duration (months)
questions.help_text: Number of months of ongoing support after go-live

questions.question: Are there any special requirements or constraints?
questions.placeholder: e.g., Compliance requirements, specific go-live constraints, budget limitations
questions.help_text: Anything else we should know about this project

questions.question: What are the key success criteria for this project?
questions.placeholder: e.g., 100% inventory accuracy, reduce order processing time by 50%, eliminate manual data entry
questions.help_text: How will success be measured?
